label: Full Body Type I Only – Phonetic

steps.text: Iceman, this is November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot, do you copy?
November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot, this is Iceman, go ahead.
Iceman, November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot, looks like we’ll need a full body Type I deicing today.
Copy that November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot, you are requesting full body Type I. Please prepare the aircraft for deicing.
Iceman, aircraft November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot ready for deicing. We are configured for Type I. Engines are running, APU is off.
Aircraft November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot, copy that, engines running and APU off, full body Type I requested. Starting Type I application now.
Aircraft November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot, do you copy?
Go ahead, Iceman, for aircraft November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot.
Yes, November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot, deicing complete. Post-deicing check complete, deicing personnel and equipment are safely away.
Iceman, aircraft November Four Four Three Delta Foxtrot copies. Thank you for your help and stay warm out there!
